mapper.select: SELECT in_id, removeTime, diaorutime, outorgan, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, c_in.department_id, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature FROM c_in LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_in.car_id = c_register.car_id ORDER BY removeTime desc
SELECT in_id, COUNT(in_id) AS yidongnums, stats FROM c_in GROUP BY stats

SELECT in_id, removeTime, diaorutime, outorgan, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, c_in.department_id, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature FROM c_in LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_in.car_id = c_register.car_id where c_in.department_id=#{departmentId} ORDER BY removeTime desc

SELECT in_id, removeTime, diaorutime, outorgan, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, c_in.department_id, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature FROM c_in LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_in.car_id = c_register.car_id WHERE remove_id = #{removeId}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM c_in WHERE in_id IN
#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT in_id, removeTime, diaorutime, outorgan, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, c_in.department_id, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature FROM c_in LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_in.car_id = c_register.car_id
WHERE c_register.carnumber LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{inorgan},'%' ) ORDER BY removeTime desc

SELECT in_id, removeTime, diaorutime, outorgan, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, c_in.department_id, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature FROM c_in LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_in.car_id = c_register.car_id WHERE rbieyong2 like CONCAT( '%',#{rbieyong2},'%' ) ORDER BY removeTime desc

SELECT in_id, removeTime, diaorutime, outorgan, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, c_in.department_id, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature FROM c_in LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_in.car_id = c_register.car_id WHERE c_in.department_id = #{0} and c_register.carnumber LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{1},'%' ) ORDER BY removeTime

SELECT in_id, removeTime, diaorutime, outorgan, inOrgan, newNum, removeNum, c_in.department_id, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2, c_register.car_id, c_register.carnumber, c_register.useNature FROM c_in LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_in.car_id = c_register.car_id WHERE c_in.department_id = #{0} and rbieyong2 like CONCAT( '%',#{1},'%' )
SELECT * FROM c_in WHERE newNum = CONCAT( '%',#{newnum},'%' )
mapper.sql: in_id, removeTime, diaorutime, inOrgan, outOrgan, department_id, newNum, car_id, removeNum, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from c_in
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into c_in (in_id, removeTime, diaorutime, inOrgan, outOrgan, department_id, newNum, car_id, removeNum, stats, notes, rbeiyong1, rbieyong2) values (#{inId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{removetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{diaorutime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{inorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{removenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stats,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rbeiyong1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rbieyong2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update c_in
in_id = #{record.inId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
removeTime = #{record.removetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
diaorutime = #{record.diaorutime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
inOrgan = #{record.inorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
outOrgan = #{record.outorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update c_in
removeTime = #{removetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
diaorutime = #{diaorutime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
inOrgan = #{inorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
outOrgan = #{outorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

removeNum = #{removenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where in_id = #{inId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update c_in set removeTime = #{removetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, diaorutime = #{diaorutime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, inOrgan = #{inorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outOrgan = #{outorgan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, newNum = #{newnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, removeNum = #{removenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stats = #{stats,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rbeiyong1 = #{rbeiyong1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rbieyong2 = #{rbieyong2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where in_id = #{inId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
